no ball.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a ball that is thrown too high, low etc towards someone trying to hit it, in the game of cricket or rounders
no ball.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a ball that the hitter does not try to hit, because it is not within the correct area
no ball.translation[2].definitions[0].de: an act of bowling the ball in the game of cricket in a way that is not allowed by the rules
